subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Decades before Super Bowl XLI, confrontations between African-American head coaches took place at the Orange Blossom Classic, the unofficial championship game for the all-black colleges of the segregated South.
snippet: Decades before Super Bowl XLI, confrontations between African-American head coaches took place at the Orange Blossom Classic, the unofficial championship game for the all-black colleges of the segregated South.
